phrases: Noir, do we really have to go?
Who do you think you are?!
I have had enough of you!
S-Sounds like something is going on...
I will not be satisfied until I do!
I see that you are as, uh... bouncy as ever.
Jeez, my face is up here, you perv!
You might need a little more.
Th-This is embarrassing for me, too...
Thank you for the other day.
Miss Maria, you seem to have recovered completely.
It is all thanks to you, Noir.
Anyway, I am glad she got better before our exam began.
All right, pipe down and get to your seats!
Before we start class, I will explain your exam.
This is your first exam after entering this school,
but it is not going to be easy, so listen carefully.
The exam period starts today and lasts for the next two weeks.
You will be gathering the monster materials listed here.
You can obtain these materials however you would like.
If you do not reach 10,000 points, you will take supplementary classes
It is not easy becoming a hero.
Let us gather the materials for the exam together.
But they will all be pretty difficult to get.
The materials listed in our assignment do not show up on the market.
What are you going for, Emma?
If we work together, we will be unstoppable.
At least, that is what we can hope for.
I guess it will be difficult, though.
We have someone we can rely on.
I knew it was that woman.
Who do you think you are?!
I have had enough of you!
S-Sounds like something is going on...
I will not be satisfied until I do!
You came at the perfect time.
This wench Sarah stole my adventurers from me!
My, I would rather you not accuse me of such things, dear.
You lack charm, so your adventurers do not need you anymore.
Is not that the truth of the matter?
I know you did something rotten to take them!
You should not be mad at me for your inability to perform.
At the guild, receptionists' marks go up
when adventurers they are in charge of perform well,
and their pay and treatment improve.
But the adventurers are the ones who choose their receptionist,
and of course, they can switch at any time.
It is an unspoken rule that receptionists do not take each other's adventurers.
But Sarah seduces adventurers into switching their receptionists.
Well, I do not have any proof.
If you are that mad about it, why do not you beat me at least once?
If I win, you will never take any of my adventurers ever again!
Never take any of my adventurers ever again!
I have never taken any of your adventurers, but I accept.
If I win, I will be taking one of your adventurers.
Noir Stardia, I am so excited for the day that I get to be your receptionist.
You are the star rookie of Odin.
If I become your receptionist, I can take you even higher.
What kind of person is Sarah, anyway?!
I will use my Discerning Eye!
Job: Receptionist Skills Skills Skills Skills
Job: Receptionist Skills Skills Skills Skills
H-Her skills are certainly, uh, specific!
No wonder she is so popular.
I am very much looking forward to seeing your results in a month!
All of my adventurers have already been disciplined.
You will never get proof that I stole them!
I cannot believe she is targeting you, too, Noir.
If Lola loses, Sarah will be my receptionist...
Coincidentally, we have to go get some rare materials for our exam at school.
So let us take care of any high-grade quests!
We will even work hard to take down some dragons!
Th-Then I would love for you to help!
I will go with you, as well.
Wait, you are coming with us, Luna?
You see, I am also an adventurer.
I did not want to be hit with Cowardice while on a quest with others,
I do not want to die
so I would been working solo for years.
So that is why you joined Odin?
I still do my clerical duties as I take care of quests.
So I would love to be your slave...
That is, I would love to join your party.
I am pretty sure I just heard her say slave!
I would be honored to go on adventures with you, Luna!
Anyway, we cannot let that chick take Noir!
Let us show Sarah who is boss!
Thus we completed Lola's quests, one after another,
and tried to come up with a plan to take down a dragon
as we gathered materials for our exam.
According to an adventurer I met in the mountains,
But I heard they hate humans and will try to kill them without warning.
It would be dangerous to fight one head-on...
Hey, that is a great idea!
If we are going to attack it after it falls in,
using a spear would probably be optimal.
We are going to stab it to death!
So then we used the money we received from the duke
to buy long spears and such.
I gathered LP by getting close with Emma, Luna, and Alice.
Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills
We got a skill to deal with a dragon, and now we are fully prepared!
Tigerson gave us a ride to Treasure Mountain,
Okay, I am going to find out where our enemy is.
Where is the dragon closest to here?
There is one 665 meters north of here.
That is closer than I thou
We need to do this for his headaches.
A-Anyway, I know where the dragon is!
Let us put our plan into motion!
I will take care of the rest.
I wonder if I can nullify any of its skills.
We will just have to do this as we planned.
I was aiming for its tail!
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
Are you going to die and leave me all alone?
Our bonds gave us this victory.
Wow, you actually killed a dragon.
We successfully took down a dragon and turned in the materials required for the exam.
We gave the rest of the materials to Lola, and then,
it was time for the announcement of the midterm results in the receptionists' battle.
I have not seen one in forever.
Well, it is all thanks to Emma and Luna helping me out.
I will need you to add in my points, too.
Otherwise, it is just not fair.
There is no mistake in the materials I checked.
You do not have that undying thirst to win.
and as promised, I will reward you... heartily.
Here are your Touch Me Anywhere coupons.
We will save the Touch Lola Anywhere one for another day.
Would you like to redeem those now?
Now, just relax and leave this to me.
I do not believe having the adventurers do everything is what a receptionist should do.
I do my absolute best to support adventurers, both body and soul.
So that adventurers can work even harder tomorrow...
You take on far too much responsibility.
Feel free to vent whenever you need to.
I will be happy to listen as long as you need me to.
Those words alone are enough to make me happy.
All right, that completes this treatment.
You want to collect some rare items so that receptionist can turn the tables.
I am sure Floor 7 will not disappoint.
The seventh floors of dungeons are usually bonus stages.
But since you have got a chance at rare items, it will be hard to clear.
Then I need to get even stronger.
Are there any skills you would recommend?
Why do not you Get Creative and make magic skills with those three attributes?
Magic skills with those three attributes?
It has the holy attribute, too, so it is great for frying up zombies.
You can hit things with water,
and also use it as potable drinking water when you are lost.
Usually, you use it to protect yourself,
but you can use Editor to customize it and make it even stronger.
Okay, that should take care of the prep.
The most important skill is this!
You can combine magic skills that you have gained previously
to make an ultimate spell that only you can use!
I will take Stone Bullet and Holy Flame...
Thanks to this, I have become more powerful today.
I am sure I will be able to become even stronger in the future.
Just thinking about that is a bit... scary.
Delicious meals also help increase LP.
And that is exactly why I went for dinner with Luna, but...
Y-You have had too much to drink.
Okay, I will be going now.
Thank you for... putting me in your party...
Next time, A Little Girl's Wish.
